info.description: This is a description for authorization
info.title: Continu's Open API

get.description:
This endpoints lists all Assessments for specific users. Users should be specified as a comma separated list of email addresses for which the Assessment information is required.
You also have the option to specify a date range using the from or until Unix Epoch timestamp.
get.summary: Lists User Assessments Completion Information for all the user emails in the mandatory for_users argument

parameters.description: Comma Separated List of users for which to return the AssessmentsList
parameters.name: for_users

parameters.description: From date in Unix time (AKA Epoch time, seconds since 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970)
parameters.name: from

parameters.description: Until date in Unix time (AKA Epoch time, seconds since 00:00:00 UTC on 1 January 1970)
parameters.name: until

get.description: GET method that returns a pong/alive message to check API's responsiveness
